Uses of Package
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job

Packages that use me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job
Package
Description
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job
Provides basic features to create jobs and tasks (activities).
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.profile
This package provides the data structure used to manage the availability of computing resources.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.scheduler
This package provides multiple scheduling algorithms that the servers can use.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server
This package provides the main functionality to create resource pools and servers.
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.util
This package provides classes for reading job traces and creating simulation reports.
  • Classes in me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job used by me.marcosassuncao.servsim.job
    Class
    Description
    DefaultWorkUnit
    This class represents a simple work unit to be processed by a server entity.
    Job
    This class represents a job or unit of work.
    Job.Builder
    Job Builder.
    JobActivity
    This class is used to keep track of the work carried out by resources when executing a job that is preempted.
    JobResumeOverhead
    This interface defines the methods that an object should implement to compute the resume overhead of jobs.
    WorkUnit
    Interface that exposes features of jobs and tasks.
    WorkUnit.StateTransition
    Interface to state transitions of a work unit.
    WorkUnit.Status
    Possible task/job statuses.
    WorkUnitEvent.Type
    Types of job events.

    WorkUnit

    Description
    DefaultWorkUnit
    This class represents a simple work unit to be processed by a server entity.
    Job
    This class represents a job or unit of work.
    Reservation
    Reservation represents a resource reservation request made by a customer to reserve a given number of resources from a provider.
    WorkUnit.Status
    Possible task/job statuses.
    WorkUnitEvent
    An event triggered by a change in a work unit.
